business.headline: IndiGo gets Rs 944 crore tax penalty, calls it erroneous and frivolousBudget carrier IndiGo's parent company said it had received a Rs 944 crore tax penalty order from the Income Tax Department. The company plans to challenge the order legally and called it "frivolous and erroneous".

Sensex, Nifty closing: Top stocks that gained and lost on BSE, NSEIT and auto sector stocks dragged the market down. The fall in IT and auto stocks is linked to concerns over US reciprocal tariffs, which are set to come into effect on April 2.

Thailand stock exchange halts trading after earthquake hits MyanmarFollowing tremors from the Myanmar earthquake, the Stock Exchange of Thailand suspended all trading for the Friday afternoon session.

DA hiked by 2%: Here's how much central government employees will earn nowWith the 2% hike, DA has now risen from 53% to 55%. Pensioners will also experience a similar increase in their Dearness Relief (DR).

Sensex, Nifty end FY25 on a weak note as Trump tariffs weigh on Dalal StreetThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 191.51 points to close at 77,414.92, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 72.60 points to end at 23,519.35.

How India saw a billionaire boom in just 10 yearsIndia's billionaire club isn't just growing—it's thriving. A decade ago, cracking this list was a rare feat. Now, it's happening faster than ever. Even with market swings and economic headwinds, the country keeps adding new names to its billionaire ranks.

Salary boost for central government employees, DA hiked by 2%With this revision, DA will rise from 53% to 55%, offering a salary boost to employees. The last DA increase took place in July 2024, when it was raised from 50% to 53%.
Missed TDS on rent? Here's what tax department is doingThe law requires tenants to deduct TDS at 2% on rent above Rs 50,000 per month, in case the landlord is a resident Indian.

India offers to lower US farm tariffs, looks to strengthen trade ties: ReportIndia-US trade talk: The government has proposed reducing import duties on several US agricultural products, including almonds, walnuts, cranberries, pistachios, and lentils.

Why is stock market falling today? 3 things investors need to knowThe S&P BSE Sensex was down 339.66 points to 77,266.77 at 1:13 pm and the NSE Nifty50 traded 100.45 points lower to trade at 23,491.50. Here are three important points retail investors need to know.

India's billionaires have wealth bigger than Saudi Arabia's GDP. Check detailsIndia's billionaires now have a combined wealth that exceeds the entire economy of Saudi Arabia. India ranks third globally in the number of billionaires, behind the United States and China.

Health insurance rejected? Here are 5 things you need to knowUnderstanding why health insurance claims are rejected is important as it will help you avoid unnecessary stress or financial burden during medical emergencies.

entertainment.headline: Salman Khan's Sikandar box office performance might be impacted. Here's whySuperstar Salman Khan's Sikandar's box office performance might be severely impacted in the days to come. Already, trade experts are predicting only a Rs 30 crore opening.

Sikandar box office Day 1 prediction: Salman film to open around Rs 30 crore-markSikandar box office Day 1 prediction: Superstar Salman Khan's latest release, Sikandar, is gearing up for a grand opening. According to trade reports, Sikandar might make somewhere around Rs 25-30 crore on its opening day.

Actor Vidyut Jammwal supports Kunal Kamra, asks why no one questions Kamaal R KhanActor Vidyut Jammwal has seemingly extended his support to comedian Kunal Kamra in his latest social media post. He also asked why no one ever questions actor Kamaal R Khan's statements that often target women and the country itself.

Aishwarya Rai, Abhishek Bachchan, and Aaradhya's viral pics from cousin's weddingA photo of Aishwarya Rai enjoying her cousin's wedding with her husband-actor Abhishek Bachchan and daughter Aaradhya has gone viral.

Empuraan box office Day 3: Mohanlal's film inches close to Rs 50 crore markPrithviraj Sukumaran's third directorial, L2: Empuraan, witnessed a slight rise in domestic earnings on Saturday. The film released in theatres on March 27.

PM Modi's big shoutout to rapper Hanumankind for his song Run it UpPrime Minister Narendra Modi has congratulated Indian-origin rapper Hanumankind for his latest song, Run it Up. The PM shared his congratulatory wishes to the artiste during his Mann Ki Baat address.

From regal forts to peacocks: Priyanka Chopra gets grand welcome in JaipurPriyanka Chopra reached Jaipur for her professional commitments. The actor shared a bunch of pictures from her stay on social media.

MobLand review: A gritty crime drama with a stellar castReleased-Mon Mar 31, 2025MobLand delves into the violent world of two crime families in London. With a stellar cast, this series offers gripping drama and intense power dynamics. Read on and find out if it suits your taste.

Mohanlal says Gujarat riot themes to be removed from Empuraan: Regret mental painActor Mohanlal has apologised over riot references in his film L2: Empuraan. The Malayalam star released a statement on social media on Sunday amid the ongoing row.

Kerala Chief Minister watches Empuraan: Freedom of expression must be protectedKerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan recently watched Prithviraj's L2: Empuraan and shared his take on social media. The film has been caught in the middle of a controversy over its allusion to the Gujarat riots.

Sikandar X reviews: Fans praise Salman Khan's entry, say 'goosebumps guaranteed' Live Updates Salman Khan's much-awaited movie Sikandar has finally been released in theatres today, March 30. Fans showered their love on the film and praised Salman's return to the big screen.
Salman Khan's Sikandar leaked online hours before theatrical releaseSalman Khan's Sikandar was leaked online hours before its release on March 30. The movie was available on various pirated sites.

Vishnu Manchu, Akshay Kumar's Kannappa release postponedVishnu Manchu's upcoming film, Kannappa, has been delayed. The actor shared a statement on social media and addressed the reason behind the delay.

Jewel Thief stars Jaideep Ahlawat, Nikita Dutta on a heist to win hearts. WatchJaideep Ahlawat and his Jewel Thief co-star Nikita Dutta won hearts with their adorable video on the song 'Price Tag'. Their upcoming film is slated to release on Netflix on April 25.

Neha Kakkar's Melbourne event organisers deny claim of mismanagement: We're in debtSinger Neha Kakkar's Melbourne concert organisers have denied her claims of mismanagement and said that in fact after the event, they are the ones in debt.

17 cuts in Mohanlal's Empuraan after row over Gujarat riots depiction: SourcesPrithviraj Sukumaran's directorial, Empuraan, will have 17 cuts in the film after protests erupted online over the film's indirect depiction of the Gujarat riots. It is reported that the edited version will be screened from April 2.

Sonu Nigam visits LK Advani and his daughter, calls them his 'extended family'Singer Sonu Nigam recently visited the residence of veteran BJP leader LK Advani in New Delhi. The artiste shared a post highlighting the same on his social media handle.

The Bhootnii trailer: Sanjay Dutt takes on Palak Tiwari and Mouni Roy's ghostsThe first full trailer of Sanjay Dutt's upcoming horror-comedy, Bhootnii, is here. Apart from Dutt, the film also features Sunny Singh, Palak Tiwari and Mouni Roy in pivotal roles.

general news.headline: Six dead, several injured after landslide in Himachal Pradesh's KulluThe landslide occurred at around 5 pm when the people sitting on the edge of the road were crushed by a big tree that toppled down along with the debris.

1 dead after 11 coaches of Guwahati-bound express train derail in OdishaOne person died and eight others, including two from Assam, were injured after 11 coaches of the Bengaluru-Kamakhya Express derailed in Odisha's Cuttack. Restoration work on the affected stretch was underway on war footing.

Mitchell Starc haunts SRH once again as DC flaunt title aspirationsIPL 2025, DC vs SRH: Delhi Capitals came up with an all-round performance to hammer SunRIsers Hyderabad by 7 wickets in Vizag on Sunday, March 30. Mitchell Starc's five-wicket haul and Faf du Plessis's quick-fire 50 helped SRH win with four overs to spare, chasing 164 without breaking a sweat.

Roblox and Adolescence: How video games bring the devil into a child's roomNetflix's Adolescence has sparked discussions about the impact of social media on teens and early teens. Beyond social media, many children immerse themselves in online video games — a world that parents are largely unfamiliar with. Platforms like Roblox and Fortnite expose young players to strangers. There are chances of cyberbullying and exposure to adult content. Here's all about the dark world and how to keep children safe.

Tarun Tahiliani on his pret label 'OTT' and redefining everyday luxuryTarun Tahiliani, who showcased his latest collection on Day 4 of the ongoing Lakme Fashion Week X FDCI, talked about his pret label, his collection and much more.

American woman explains why she prefers raising her children in India over USIn a now-viral video post shared on Instagram, an American woman explained why she believes raising her children in India is better than in the US.

Initially, he got minor injuries treated at a small hospital and got himself referred to a bigger hospital but never actually visited one.

sports.headline: DC vs SRH: Mitchell Starc rocks Sunrisers Hyderabad with maiden T20 5-wicket haulIPL 2025, DC vs SRH: Delhi Capitals' fast bowler Mitchell Starc finished with figures of 3.4-0-35-5 against Sunrisers Hyderabad on Sunday as he recorded his best figures in T20s.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
